conclusion: Determine the maximum value of the electromotive force (EMF) generated by the AC generator.
The AC generator has a rectangular coil with m=100 turns.
The resistance of the coil is r=10Ω.
The resistance of the slip rings is R=90Ω.
The AC voltmeter is an ideal meter.
Calculate the inductance L using the formula L = mR/n.
Inductance L is calculated as L = 10 H.
Calculate the induced EMF E using the formula E = -dΦ/dt.
The magnetic flux Φ varies sinusoidally with time t as shown in Figure (Z).
The magnetic flux Φ through each turn of the coil is given by Φ = B ⋅ A ⋅ sin(ωt).
Calculate the area A of the coil as A = 5000 cm².
Calculate the magnetic flux density B as B = 4.0 × 10⁻⁵ T.
Calculate the angular frequency ω as ω = 6.28 rad/s.
Substitute values into the formula for the induced EMF: E = -1256 cos(6.28 t).
Calculate the maximum value of the EMF as E_max = -1256 V.
The maximum value of the electromotive force generated by the AC generator is -1256 V.
